meico.mpm.elements.styles

Class DynamicsStyle

  • java.lang.Object
    • meico.xml.AbstractXmlSubtree
      • meico.mpm.elements.styles.GenericStyle
        • meico.mpm.elements.styles.DynamicsStyle

  • public class DynamicsStyle
extends GenericStyle
    This class interfaces dynamics style definitions. Basically, these define a string (such as "p", "sf", "forte", "as loud as possible") and assotiate it with an instance of DynamicsDef.
    Author:
    Axel Berndt
